subheader: My name is Guillermo, and I love solving problems ❤️
description: I enjoy turning problems into challenges by gathering data, discovering potential solutions, and choosing the solutions that better align with the desired outcome. I also enjoy iterating solutions, as the first solution isn't usually the best, but can lead to it.
reachOut: If you have any idea you'd like to discuss, feel free to reach out and I'll be happy to help!
